alert.note: Alert for Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 10:59PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Howard and northern Winneshiek Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ridgeway, or 8 miles east of Cresco, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Decorah around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Vernon Springs County Park, Vernon Springs, Nordness, Highlandville, Burr Oak, Bluffton, Chimney Rock Campground, Locust, State Road 9 And 245th Street and County Roads W 14 And A 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
